channel.title: Motor Graders on
channel.description: Recent content in Motor Graders on

item.title: E04618
item.description: Ex-army Caterpillar 130G, Sold new in 2007, only 201 Hrs from new! Machine is in as-new condition, Low profile E-rops cab, 12ft (3.65Mtr) moldboard, scarifier, engine enclosures, 13.00-24 tyres. Machine is in very clean condition. Machine can be repainted in original Cat colors at extra cost. Rear ripper can be supplied at extra cost. Inspections are welcome. 8 units available!

item.title: E04625
item.description: Ex-army Caterpillar 130G, Delivered new in 2002, only 545 Hrs from new! Machine is in as-new condition, Low profile O-rops cab, 12ft (3.65Mtr) moldboard, scarifier, engine enclosures, 13.00-24 tyres. Machine is in very clean condition. Machine can be repainted in original Cat colors at extra cost. Rear ripper can be supplied at extra cost. Inspections are welcome. 8 units available!

item.title: E04695
item.description: Ex-army Caterpillar 130G, Sold new in 2007, Machine is in as-new condition,183 hrs on meter, Low profile E-rops cab, 12ft (3.65Mtr) moldboard with new cutting edge, scarifier, engine enclosures, 13.00-24 tyres. Machine is in very clean condition. Machine can be repainted in original Cat colors at extra cost. Rear ripper can be supplied at extra cost. Inspections are welcome. 8 units available!

item.title: E04719
item.description: Ex-army Caterpillar 130G, Sold new in 2008, Only 600 Hrs on meter! Machine is in as-new condition, Low profile E-rops cab, 12ft (3.65Mtr) moldboard with new cutting edges, scarifier, engine enclosures, 13.00-24 tyres. Machine is in very clean condition. Machine can be repainted in original Cat colors at extra cost. Rear ripper can be supplied at extra cost. Inspections are welcome. 8 units available!

item.title: E04723
item.description: Caterpillar 12H motor grader, Low profile E-rops cab, 6 cylinder Caterpillar 3306DI Non-electronic engine with 165HP (123kW), 8F-6R powershift transmission, 14ft (4.26 Mtr) moldboard, hydr. tip control, centershift, new cutting edge, 14.200 Kgs operating weight, drawbar, 14.00-24 tyres on average 40% remaining. Machine comes straight out of work and is in clean condition. Inspections are welcome. Rear ripper can be fitted on request at extra costs.

item.title: E04757
item.description: Ex-army Caterpillar 130G, Sold new in 2007, Only 214 Hrs from new! Machine is in as-new condition, Low profile E-rops cab, 12ft (3.65Mtr) moldboard, new cutting edge, scarifier, engine enclosures, 13.00-24 tyres. New rear ripper with full set of teeth, Machine has new paint and is in very clean condition. Inspections are welcome. 8 units available!

item.title: E05038
item.description: Caterpillar 140H, well maintained Ex Government grader, Low profile E-rops cab with air conditioning, 6 cylinder turbocharged Caterpillar 3306DI engine with 185HP, powershift transmission, 14ft (4.26 Mtr) moldboard, centershift, hydr. tip control, rear ripper will be installed,14.00-24 tyres average 60% remaining, front and rear work lights, drawbar. Machine comes straight out of work and is in clean condition. Full history available on request. Expected in our yard June 2019.

item.title: E05039
item.description: Caterpillar 140K, E-rops cab with air conditioning, 6 cylinder turbocharged Caterpillar C7.2 ACERT Technology engine with 170HP (127kW), powershift transmission, MS rear ripper with full set of teeth, push block, NEW 17.5-25 tyres will be installed, front & rear work lights. Machine comes straight out of work and is in clean condition. Inspections are welcome.
